sub_title: Behavioural Science Expert | Driving Positive Change with Evidence-Based Strategies | Exploring the intersection of BeSci & AI
summary:
Experienced Behavioural Insights Strategist with a strong academic background and a dedication to driving positive, meaningful change. 

With 15 years of experience in consumer insights, including 10 years as a behavioural science specialist, my academic background in consumer behaviour, cultural psychology, and linguistics, and my previous role as a co-founder of a London-based insights consultancy, I have a comprehensive understanding of behaviour from different angles. Leveraging my research skills, I am adept at understanding customer and employee behaviour and designing interventions that create lasting behaviour change in organizations. 

Here's what sets me apart:

🔍 Analytical Problem-Solving:  With an analytical mind, scientific approach, and advanced research skills, I excel at unraveling complex challenges, providing data-driven recommendations, and developing innovative solutions. My structured thinking enables me to identify critical issues and deliver impactful results.

🧠 Behavioral Science Expertise: Backed by a strong academic background in behavioral science and a commitment to continuous learning, I stay up to date with the latest research and cutting-edge insights. Leveraging this knowledge, I generate evidence-based solutions that address complex problems holistically.

💡 Creative Thinking: With a wide range of experiences and a curiosity-driven mindset, I bring fresh perspectives to every project. By thinking outside the box, I develop tailored strategies that unlock innovative approaches and generate insightful solutions.

🚀 Strategic Impact: I adopt a results-oriented approach to problem-solving, always keeping organizational success in mind. Through strategic support of behavioral science application and the production of high-quality insights, I contribute to areas of strategic importance and help shape decision-making processes.

💬 Effective Communication and Collaboration: Confident in my communication skills, I can effectively translate complex concepts into actionable insights. As a collaborative team player, I thrive in cross-functional environments, working seamlessly with stakeholders and clients to achieve shared goals.

Open to full/part-time roles and fractional services - let's connect to discuss how we might collaborate to drive meaningful and transformative results together!

profile_positions.description:
I work with global market research agencies, brand consultancies and behaviour change agencies as a consultant to advise on behaviour change/behavioural design and market research projects as well as providing workshops and training.

As a behavioural insights strategist, my expertise is in making the science of human behaviour accessible, relevant and actionable. I solve difficult puzzles to help companies reach their goals through behaviour change. If you have an outcome in mind, I can work out what behaviours you need to change, and how best to do it.

My academic background in marketing, linguistics and cross-cultural psychology gives me a deep understanding of how to apply the latest findings on human behaviour and, being an entrepreneur, I’m focused on the practical applications.  

Partners and collaborators include: Ipsos Behavioural Science & Global Science Organisation, Ipsos Healthcare, Bright Harbour, Wonder Insights & Strategy and Think Tank.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Behavioural Insights Strategist

profile_positions.description: I founded the Dutch Behavioral Science network to bring together practitioners and academics in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Working with a Finnish aviation and mobility start-up to develop their customer and market intelligence and customer experience competencies, as well as working with marketing to develop campaigns designed to improve customer satisfaction, loyalty, and brand image.

Specific activities:
- monitoring industry trends, developing a customer understanding platform and championing customer perspectives in the company’s strategic decision-making
- developing a customer experience that reflects the desired brand identity and translates the brand promise into reality by advocating for consumer needs
- applying behavioural science in the development of the customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Chief Customer Experience Officer

profile_positions.description:
Founding partner at behavioural insights consultancy that was one of the first agencies to pioneer the use of behavioural science in the market research industry, and one of GRIT Top 50 innovative companies index in 2018 and 2019. 

Developed a suite of qualitative and quantitative research tools that integrate behavioural science and led the company's qualitative research projects. 

Clients included: Intercontinental Hotels Group, Red Bull, IKEA, BBC, SC Johnson, Beam Suntory and ING.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder, Behavioural Insight Strategist & Innovation Director

profile_positions.description: Co-founded the London Behavioural Economics Network to bring together practitioners and academics  in London.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: Editor of InDecision (indecisionblog.com) - a blog run by early career researchers and practitioners in judgment and decision making. We want to give younger scholars a voice, reach a wider audience with their work, and give everyone a chance to see what happens inside decision-making science.
profile_positions.title: Editor

profile_positions.description: Internal and external communications consultant for Society of Consumer Psychology and Journal of Consumer Psychology (Top 20 in Financial Times Research Ranking).
profile_positions.title: Communications Officer

profile_positions.description: Six-month contract in the Marketing division, working on innovation and new product development projects for GlaxoSmithKline. The role included managing the project throughout the research process as well as supporting the senior executives.
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Executive (contract)
